changeSet.author: emmanuel
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS immunization ( id integer NOT NULL DEFAULT nextval('immunization_id_seq'::regclass), patient_id bigint, patient_uuid character varying(100) COLLATE pg_catalog."default", immunization_type character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default", unique_immunization_data character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default", vaccination_date date, archived integer, CONSTRAINT immunization_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id) );
